mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_grade, user_name, user_id, user_pw, email, birth, join_date, phone, tongsin, basic_addr, detail_addr, buy_sum, point, admin, operate FROM users

INSERT INTO users (user_no, user_name, user_id, user_pw, email, birth, join_date, phone, tongsin, basic_addr, detail_addr) VALUES (user_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{email}, #{birth}, sysdate, #{phone}, #{tongsin}, #{basicAddr}, #{detailAddr})
SELECT user_no, user_grade, user_name, user_id, user_pw, email, birth, join_date, phone, tongsin, basic_addr, detail_addr, buy_sum, point, admin, operate FROM users WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT user_no, user_grade, user_name, user_id, user_pw, email, birth, join_date, phone, tongsin, basic_addr, detail_addr, buy_sum, point, admin, operate FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND operate = 'Y'

SELECT o.order_no, o.user_no, o.product_quantity, o.used_point, o.basic_addr, o.detail_addr, o.payment_method, o.order_date, o.delivery_charge, o.price, o.order_status, od.order_detail_no, od.product_code, od.order_detail_price, od.order_detail_quantity FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_no = o.user_no JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_no = od.order_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
select count(user_id) from users where user_id=#{userId}
